item.title: DataViz Makeover 2
item.dc:creator: Amos Lau
item.description: This post will be looking at two data visualisations created by a research scientist of a research team conducting a study to understand the willingness of the public to take COVID-19 vaccinations.

item.title: DataViz Makeover 1
item.dc:creator: Amos Lau
item.description: This post will be looking at Chart 6 Resident labour force by age in MOM's Report: Labour Force in Singapore 2019 to see if there are possible areas of improvement and come up with a proposed visualisation to improve on those areas.

item.title: Welcome to Amos' Visual Analytics Blog
item.dc:creator: Amos Lau
item.description: Welcome to my blog. This blog was started for my masters module on Visual Analytics, and will be updated as and when I find other interesting things to write on.
